content.baslik: SUN CARE KIDS LOTION - SPF 30 – for high level of protection
content.icerik: Especially developed for kids, who are over-sensitive to sunlight and have a high risk of sunburn.Innova sun kids lotion provides a very high protection against harmful effects of UVA + UVB rays, minimizing sun-based allergy risk and also prevents skin from dehydrating.
